ygData.subject: Re: [_EQ_Magic] Root Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think it has to do with higher levels resisting lower spells.  You ll notice they resist the lower DD spells more often, too.  I think it s just so you
ygData.messageBody:
> This is the bread and butter spell for a wizard from 4th lvl on.
> Is it just me or does the Root spell get less effective the higher
>in lvl you become? I and now 30th lvl and Root gets resisted more
>often than i can remember and gets broken faster. Bonds of Force is
>ok. But i would like to know if Root gets nerfed the Higher in LVLs
>one gets.
>
> Farborg Wizard of the 30th Circle
>
> On the Tarew-Marr Server. :)

I think it has to do with higher levels resisting lower spells. You'll
notice they resist the lower DD spells more often, too. I think it's just
so you don't blast them with Shock of Frost two dozen times for a much
smaller amount of mana and aggro.

Zalmabus Starcaster
Brell's Legion
Druzzil Ro server
